Traits.Name: Body of the Land
Traits.Description: When defeated, roll a d6. The Hob collapses into the natural land, disappearing. Every space of this Hob becomes a height 1 terrain piece (5-6), difficult terrain (2-4), or a pit (1).

Traits.Name: Drag Under
Traits.Description: When this Hob ends its turn, it can choose an adjacent foe, which must save. On a failed save, that foe takes [D], and remove both the Hob and that foe from play as they dive into a pool of magicked water. Both return to play at the start of that foe's next turn, in any free space in range 3 of their original location.

Actions.Name: Summon Pool
Actions.Description: The Hob swaps places with a character in range 2, teleporting both. If either character cannot teleport, this move cannot be made.
